messageobject.name: Reachable
messageobject.documentation: Asynchronous message. A boolean result of a checkreach call.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: An Id matching the one sent by client. Allows bot to match answer with right querry.

property.name: Reachable
property.documentation: True if the bot can run here directly, false otherwise.

property.name: From
property.documentation: Exact location of bot at time of check.
